thread.title: Be Part Of The 500 At QC Club
thread.title_full: Be Part Of The 500 At QC Club

author: Thidawan Tunya
title: Be Part Of The 500 At QC Club
text:
Email 
Nova’s Luttsy (David Lutteral) has joined the QC Club team as an Ambassador, leading the charge for the brand-new QC500 membership package. 
Under new management since February 2015, the Queensland Cricketers’ Club is attracting new patronage with a range of membership options for a younger crowd and corporates, as well as its individual memberships for sports and leisure enthusiasts. 
The new QC500 is created for 18 – 35 year olds, offering young women and men a place to network, socialise and enjoy all the fun and exclusivity of Brisbane’s premier club. 
Limited to an intake of 500 young professionals and socialites, QC500 includes access to a number of AFL games and an entire summer of national and international Cricket, all from the stadium’s best seats with fast bar access, air conditioned comfort and premium food and beverages. 
For the social butterflies and men-about-town, QC Club offers a unique and chic alternative to the usual bar environment. With its stylish new décor created in collaboration with leading designer Paul Hunt, access to ‘Sir’ restaurant and the bar with its live entertainment program, QC Club is the perfect spot for after-work drinks, dinner with friends or a night out – all complimented by incredible views of the iconic Gabba oval and stadium. 
And fill your diary with the exclusive QC500 events calendar including golf days, race days, private cocktail parties and more – where you’ll be sure to add to your contacts with plenty of like-minded young women and men. 
QC Club is just not cricket – it’s Brisbane’s premier leisure and social club. Be part of the 500 and Live. Enjoy. Belong at QC Club. 
For more information on memberships and QC Club’s offerings, visit www.qcclub.com.au . Share this:
